text: Depletion of Nrf2 Aggravated the Cell Death in Astrocytes after Scratch Injury
Cell death was detected by microscope and CCK-8 analysis at 24 h after scratch .
The detachment from culture plate , cell lost , and cytoplasmic process distortion were mostly observed in both sides of scratch line in group KO TBI .

CCK-8 assay also showed lower OD value of group KO TBI ( 0.38 +/- 0.064 ) than that of group WT TBI ( 0.98 +/- 0.098 ) ( P < 0.01 ) , which also suggested more cell death in group KO TBI ( Figure 1 ) .
There was no difference between two sham-operated groups .
